org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging

Class Request.RequestMessage<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging.Request.RequestMessage<RESPONSE_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    RESPONSE_TYPE - The class of the result returned after the Request operates on the target actor.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Message
    Enclosing class:
    Request<RESPONSE_TYPE>

    private static final class Request.RequestMessage<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    The Message subclass used to pass requests and to return the results.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean foreign
      True when the result is to be returned via a mailbox with a mailbox factory that differs from the mailbox factory of the target mailbox.
      protected MessageSource messageSource
      The source mailbox or pender that will receive the results.
      protected Message oldMessage
      The message targeted to the source mailbox which, when processed, resulted in this message.
      protected Request<RESPONSE_TYPE> request
      The Request object carried by this message.
      protected java.lang.Object response
      The response created when this message is applied to the target actor.
      protected boolean responsePending
      True when a response to this message has not yet been determined.
      protected ResponseProcessor<?> responseProcessor
      The application object that will process the results.
      protected ExceptionHandler sourceExceptionHandler
      The exception handler that was active in the source mailbox at the time when this message was created.

        Creates a request message.
        Parameters:
        _foreign - True when the result is to be returned via a mailbox with a mailbox factory that differs from the mailbox factory of the target mailbox.
        _source - The source mailbox or pender that will receive the results.
        _old - The message targeted to the source mailbox which, when processed, resulted in this message.
        _request - The Request object carried by this message.
        _handler - The exception handler that was active in the source mailbox at the time when this message was created.
        _rp - The application object that will process the results.
